app.name: Nintendont
app.long_description:
Commiters: GerbilSoft, JoostinOnline, GreyRogue, Howard, Cyan, nastys Modifications by: MiiJack
Project website: https://github.com/FIX94/Nintendont
This Build of Nintendont allows you to run Extended GameCube games on a Wii or Wii U from an SD or HDD device.
